mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO dsed_contract_pdf_edspay_seal
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
creator,

INSERT INTO dsed_contract_pdf_edspay_seal ( gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, modifier, pdf_id, user_seal_id, investor_amount) values
(now(), now(), #{item.creator}, #{item.modifier}, #{item.pdfId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.userSealId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.investorAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE dsed_contract_pdf_edspay_seal
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = now(),
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pdf_id = #{pdfId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_seal_id = #{userSealId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
investor_amount = #{investorAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
WHERE is_delete = 0 AND id = #{rid ,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dsed_contract_pdf_edspay_seal WHERE is_delete = 0 AND id=#{rid ,jdbcType=BIGINT} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT edspay.id rid,edspay.gmt_create,edspay.gmt_modified,edspay.creator, edspay.modifier,edspay.pdf_id,edspay.user_seal_id,edspay.investor_amount, seal.edspay_user_card_id,seal.user_name FROM dsed_contract_pdf_edspay_seal edspay LEFT JOIN af_user_seal seal on edspay.user_seal_id = seal.id WHERE seal.is_delete = 0 AND pdf_id=#{pdfId ,jdbcType=BIGINT} and edspay.is_delete = 0 LIMIT 0,1
